Title: SF team bandwidth causing delays
Description: SF team busy with other stakeholder tasks may delay completion of NADCAP action plan and SF documentation review, risking readiness for NADCAP Audit and pre-audit planned for 2026-03-26.
Mitigations: Prioritise NADCAP tasks; assign backup reviewers; escalate to stakeholders; schedule focused review sessions

Title: Documentation hierarchy misunderstanding
Description: If we don't fully understand documentation hierarchy, the overarching SF QMS could have inaccuracies, undermining signposting and guidance for unfamiliar users.
Mitigations: Perform documentation mapping workshop; consult QMS owner; run peer reviews

Title: Surface Finish Table 1 validation delayed
Description: Process engineer responsible for validating Surface Finish Table 1 is overloaded and may not complete the review in time.
Mitigations: Allocate deputy reviewer; extend review resources; set firm deadlines and escalate if missed
